name: AddOrUpdateUserAzure
friendlyName: Add (or update) user with password in SQL Database

author: Henry Been

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Classic Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Classic subscription to configure before running PowerShell

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM

inputs.name: serverName
inputs.label: Server Name

inputs.name: userPassword
